en.title: Innov8 Barbershop Scheduling Application
en.description: Served as Associate Project Manager on a cross-functional capstone team that partnered with a local barbershop to develop a web-based appointment and customer management system; facilitated project scoping sessions, coordinated Agile sprint planning, and supported team role alignment, resulting in the successful launch plan for a platform designed to streamline daily operations and improve client experience for a small business.
tags: hosted on aws rds and mysql databases

en.title: GoGreen Insurance Cloud Architecture
en.description: Collaborated with a project team to design a cloud migration strategy for GoGreen Insurance’s three-tier application, conducting environment analysis, defining AWS architecture requirements, and implementing a proof of concept in the AWS Learner Labs; presented a scalable, secure architecture that addressed performance bottlenecks and business continuity goals while demonstrating proficiency in EC2, VPC, IAM, and S3 configuration.

en.title: Enterprise Data Platform
en.description: Contributed to a full-stack application enhancement project by contributing to the transition from the Vue Options API to the Composition API for improved maintainability; implemented secure user authentication and role-based access control, integrated CRUD functionality for service management, and extended the dashboard with interactive data visualizations, resulting in a more secure, modular, and user-friendly experience.
tags: user authentication and role-based access control
integration of services at the data layer

en.title: MongoDB Exercises
en.description: Applied MongoDB query optimization techniques by executing targeted document retrieval operations that returned only relevant fields; demonstrated understanding of projection in NoSQL querying to enhance efficiency and reinforce best practices in data access.

en.title: VueJS Form Application
en.description: Developed an interactive form application using Vue.js, HTML, and JavaScript that dynamically displayed items, allowed users to toggle selections, and calculated total cost with proper USD currency formatting; applied Vue best practices to manage state, render components efficiently, and ensure a clean, error-free codebase, culminating in a functional and user-friendly interface.

en.title: IT Asset Management Database
en.description: Designed and implemented a comprehensive Oracle SQL database for IT Asset Management, leveraging SQL queries, data migration, and automation techniques to drive business insights and optimize performance. Utilized PL/SQL to create user-defined functions, stored procedures, and triggers, ensuring data integrity and streamlining repetitive tasks. Applied database performance tuning techniques, including indexing and query optimization, to ensure efficient database operations and informed decision-making.

en.title: College Apartment Network Design
en.description: Designed a high-performance network architecture for a luxury college apartment, leveraging real-world network design principles to balance hospitality, reliability, and scalability. Developed a layered network design with VLAN segmentation, implementing Layer 2 and Layer 3 access designs for efficient routing and failover. Utilized Cisco Meraki solutions for advanced monitoring and security, ensuring cloud-based visibility and secure SD-WAN. Conducted comprehensive cost analysis and hardware/software recommendations, specifying devices and licenses tailored for optimal performance and minimal interference.
en.institution: CIS 3347 - Information Systems Infrastructure and Networks

en.title: Network Troubleshooting Activity
en.description: Applied hands-on network troubleshooting techniques to diagnose and resolve network issues, leveraging tools like IPCONFIG, PING, ARP, NSLOOKUP, and TRACERT to analyze IP configurations, investigate DNS issues, and identify common failure points in network operations. Utilized diagnostic insights from ARP and DNS Cache to optimize network performance and resolve basic inefficiencies.

en.title: Personal Resume Website
en.description: Designed and developed a dynamic personal resume website. Utilized HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create a responsive and interactive user interface, leveraging CSS grid layout and liquid design principles to ensure a seamless user experience. Implemented client-side scripting to dynamically update content and applied JavaScript events to the Document Object Model (DOM) to enhance user engagement. Integrated web development best practices and standards, adhering to guidelines set by the W3C Consortium, to ensure cross-browser compatibility and accessibility.

en.title: Flight Planner Application
en.description: Designed and developed a comprehensive flight planning web application using cloud architecture, leveraging Python Flask for backend REST API services and JavaScript with EJS for frontend UI development. Implemented CRUD operations for airports and planes, and CRD operations for flights, ensuring seamless management of flight schedules and aircraft data. Utilized database design principles to create tables with foreign key relations, and developed a simple login API for secure user access.

en.title: 2EZ Tech Catering Management Platform
en.description: Designed and developed a fully normalized data model for a group project, transforming it into a working MySQL Server database with a GUI front-end prototype. Collaborated with team members to deliver weekly status reports and presented project deliverables on time. Created realistic data for the database and developed SQL reports/queries that met project requirements.

en.title: Greater Houston Builders Product Management System
en.description: Designed a Microsoft Access database system to streamline product management processes. Developed a comprehensive database structure with tables, and created relationships between tables to ensure data integrity and availability. Utilized the database system to record and track products efficiently, enabling easy access to product information.
tags: Roles and Functions of MS Excel
Queries, Forms, and Reports in Database

en.title: Bike Buyers Demographics
en.description: Designed and presented two data visualization projects using Tableau and Excel to explore a user-selected dataset, applying Tufte’s and Colin Ware’s theories to communicate trends and insights; crafted an analytical narrative and visual strategy to test a specific hypothesis, delivering a four-minute voice-narrated presentation and five-page report that demonstrated clear understanding of visual cognition and effective data storytelling.

en.title: Multi-step Cyber Attack Simulation
en.description: Collaborated in a team-based Capture-the-Flag cybersecurity simulation hosted on TryHackMe, that emulated real-world adversarial behavior within a virtual bookstore environment; Completed simulated reconnaissance and REST API fuzzing efforts to uncover system vulnerabilities, culminating in a comprehensive lab report that documented exploitation techniques, remediation strategies, and lessons learned to demonstrate both penetration testing proficiency and practical incident response capabilities.
